about.short: To create successful software, you need a development team that understands your business requirements. Our experts will determine a custom solution that fits your idea, timeline, and budget, then design and build the application and help you test it with real users. As a result, you will get a modern digital product that benefits your business and is loved by users.
about.description: Genixo is a technology company operating in Bilkent University Cyberpark, developing AI-focused educational platforms and corporate solutions. Our team consists of developers with deep expertise in modern web technologies and AI integrations. We build scalable, secure, and user-friendly systems using powerful technologies such as Spring Boot, Next.js, and PostgreSQL. We make a difference in Turkey's educational technology ecosystem with successful projects like StudyScore AI and Eğitim İste. We offer a wide range of solutions, from AI-powered adaptive learning platforms to corporate document management systems, from real-time exam applications to educational discovery platforms. As a trusted technology partner in our clients' digital transformation journey, we work to understand business needs and produce the most suitable solutions.

dynamism.title: Dynamism
dynamism.content: Information technology is the sector with the largest observable market share in the world, and interestingly, it didn't take long to reach this size. So how did this happen? Through technology and therefore innovation. Development and change are so fast that it can be difficult to keep up. It is becoming increasingly difficult to keep up with new dynamics and act proactively. As Genixo, our mission here is clear: to stay dynamic. Genixo's vision in this regard is to always stay current and respond to the needs of the day, no matter how fast the IT world changes and no matter how different the needs are. We have a corporate understanding that calculates the future by constantly adopting a proactive attitude and can give appropriate responses to unforeseen problems. This way we can always stay dynamic!

passion.title: Passion and Commitment
passion.content: Here, there is no commitment without passion. Without commitment, a passion can never reach its potential and is doomed to be less successful. Genixo, aware of this, is more than a company; it is a community of people who are aware that personal development has no limits, who aim to constantly improve themselves, who are passionately committed to their goals and dedicated to achieving these goals. In line with this community consciousness built on passion and dedication, we invite ourselves and everyone we work with to develop their potential, think bigger, work more dedicatedly, and be more successful!

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.content: Success can be achieved when you are talented or experienced in a job. However, for the success achieved to be permanent, a professional approach is essential; otherwise, you will definitely shorten the lifespan of the success you have achieved. The Genixo understanding aims for permanence and sustainable success both individually and corporately, with a brand culture where talented and experienced people work professionally. We don't leave success to chance with our professional business awareness.

whyDigitalTransformation.subtitle: Why Digital Transformation is No Longer an Option, but a Necessity
whyDigitalTransformation.title: What successful businesses have in common: They solved these problems.

problems.title: Competitors Are Speeding Up, You're Falling Behind
problems.problem: Your customer places an order, you say 'I'll send a quote in 2-3 days.' Your competitor sends it in 10 minutes. Who does the customer choose?
problems.solution: Digital systems give you speed. You quote faster, decide faster, and respond to customers faster.

problems.title: You Have Information But Can't See It
problems.problem: You ask 'How much profit did we make this month?' The answer comes 3 days later in Excel. You need to make an important decision but have no data.
problems.solution: With real-time reporting and dashboards, you see your data instantly. Base decisions on data, not guesses.

problems.title: Your Team is Drowning in Unnecessary Work
problems.problem: Sales team spends 2 hours a day preparing reports. Accounting manually enters invoices. Warehouse constantly counts inventory. Everyone is working but there's no time for real work.
problems.solution: Automation handles repetitive tasks. Your team focuses on value-creating work: customer service, new opportunities, growth.

problems.title: You Can't Grow Because Systems Don't Scale
problems.problem: Business is growing but each new customer, each new order creates more chaos. More Excel sheets, more WhatsApp groups, more complexity.
problems.solution: Digital systems grow with you. Managing 10 customers or 100 customers takes the same effort. We build scalable infrastructure.

problems.title: Costs Are Growing Uncontrollably
problems.problem: Employee count is rising but productivity isn't. You hire new people for each new task. Costs are ballooning but profit margins are shrinking.
problems.solution: With digital transformation, you do the same work with fewer resources. Costs decrease, errors reduce, and work gets done faster.

problems.title: Customer Expectations Have Changed
problems.problem: 10 years ago, customers would wait 3 days. Today they expect instant response, instant delivery, 24/7 access. Non-digital companies can't meet these expectations.
problems.solution: We provide modern customer experience. Automated responses, online tracking, self-service systems - your customers don't wait.
